Test Case: Verify that on the product page, the user can select the desired attribute of the product e.g. size, color, etc.,
Verify that the user can successfully buy more than one product that was added to his/her cart
Verify that logo of the company is clearly visible in every page
Verify that  filtering works correctly on category pages
Verify that there is no dead hyperlink, plugin dependency, font sizing, etc.,
Verify that all the text – product, category name, price, and product description are visible
Verify that the correct count of total products is listed on the category pages
Verify for an error message if Email, password, or any required field is left blank
Verify that all the required fields are present on the registration page
Verify that the required/mandatory fields are marked with * against the field
Verify that the registration page has both submit and cancel/reset buttons at the end
Verify that not filling the mandatory fields and clicking the submit button will lead to the validation error
Verify that not filling the optional fields and clicking the submit button will send data to the server without any validation error
Verify that all items on the next page are different from the previous page, i.e., no duplicates
Verify that the added product is present on the wishlist page
Verify that user can add products in the wish list
Verify that option to check the availability of the product is present
Verify that users can rate, review the product
Verify that user can add products to the cart
Verify that user price increase accordingly when a product is added multiple times
Verify that the user is able to navigate through all the products across different categories.
Verify that category pages have a relevant product listed specific to the category
Verify that on searching all the product satisfying the search criteria are visible on the search result page.
Verify error message when no serach result found
Verify the more relevant product for the search term is displayed on the top for a particular search term.
Verify that count of products is correctly displayed on the search result page for a particular search term.
Verify that filtering functionality correctly filters products based on the filter applied.
Verify that filtering works correctly on the search result page.
Verify that the correct count of total products is displayed after a filter is applied.
Verify that all the sort options work correctly – correctly sort the products based on the sort option chosen.
Verify that sorting works correctly on the category pages.
Verify that sorting works correctly on the search result page.
Verify that sorting works correctly on the pages containing the filtered result, after applying filters.
Verify that product count remains intact irrespective of sorting option applied.
Verify that the user can buy products added to the cart after signing in to the application (or as per the functionality of the website).
Verify that the user cannot add more than the available inventory of the product.
Verify that the delivery can be declined for the places where shipping is not available.
Verify that the Cash on Delivery option of payment is working fine.
Verify that the different pre-paid methods of payments are working fine.
Verify that product return functionality works fine.
Verify that product refund functionality works fine.
Verify website in different browsers
Verify page load of a website
Verify that every page features different items. The items don’t repeat on page to avoid duplicate items
Verify the breadcrumbs on the website's page
Verify that user can remove products from cart
Verify that user can remove products from wishlist
Verify price on checkout page
Verify user is able to add address
Verify user is able to update address
Verify user can add/remove card details
Verify discount functionality if available
Verify the order status after order is placed
